channel.title: PHP I messaging system
channel.description: I am making a Clan website, I would like to have a email messaging system. I would like a php page that would ask for username and pass, then will be able to be send a email to all the emails in a txt file on my server. I also would like to have a page where the clan members can add their emails to the text file. Also to make sure there are no duplicates of the emails(if possible at the moment.) Thankyou You all are always reliable :D[br][size=1]Posted at: December 13, 2006, 03:27:13 PM[/size][hr]help. BUMP
